name: Five Nights at Wario's 2
description:
*EXTRACT THE FILE FROM THE .ZIP FILE IN ORDER FOR SAVING TO WORK*  This is the second game in the series, which has now gotten an update. All five mainline games are getting updates, which adds new features and fixes bugs. All five updated games will together give you access to a cross-game Easter Egg. Check the other game pages to see if their updated versions are available yet.  The updated version of Five Nights at Wario's 2 contains:  -Custom Night  -Tons of bug fixes  -Lots of quality-of-life improvements  -Easter Eggs  -2 new Game Modes  -Other surprises  ---------------------------------------- 

Join the FNAW Discord HERE: https://discord.gg/4Zw7K3a 

The sequel to Five Nights at Wario's is here! To celebrate the release of FNaF 3,

I bring you this! :) I've tried to make it more original than the first, with a new lightning mechanic and more!  This is a fan-game, made for fun. I hope you'll enjoy it!
